bioprojects.title: The strategy of a novel way to enhance bacterial motility

description.title: ClpXV78F mediated FlhDC accumulation bursts motility of Escherichia coli
description.comment: To date, only a few studies identified hyper-motile isolates that affect FlhDC at the post-translational level. Here we obtained this kind of hyper-motile isolates by evolving an E. coli K12 NCM3722 wild-type strain (CY598) on the soft agar plate. These isolates shared one single point mutation in ClpX, making ClpX another hot locus during evolution of bacterial motility. We then revealed the molecular mechanism of the ClpX mutant mediated FlhDC accumulation and reasoned the trade-off between motility and growth at the molecular level for the first time.
